about us

CG Engineering Consults is a Ugandan -based consultancy firm that was established in 2019, out of the ideas of architects and engineers. It is a firm that uses the delicate balance between youthfulness and experience so as to design, create and innovate in this modern era. It specializes in architectural and engineering work involving buildings, roads and other infrastructure, project management, planning of towns and estates. The concept, work ethic and professional outlook of CG Engineering Consults Ltd was born out of the zeal to create works with structural durability, design uniqueness and character for the dynamic market. For this reason, we involve skill and time in pre-design research, surveys and planning to ensure that before the project execution starts, all facts have been established. Our professional human resource includes architects, engineers, works inspectors, surveyors, planners and environmentalists. Our service delivery is marked by quality products with minimal costs delivered on time. With this, we create places and spaces that span the ideals of functionality to cover style and add value to our clients’ lives and businesses. Our scope of work covers urban and rural landscapes, commercial and individual arenas and every structure we plan, supervise or create epitomizes the concepts of skill, modernity, innovation and execution to portray the finest image that construction materials can accomplish. .

Mission and Vision The mission of this firm is to offer clients the best engineering services in the country. We are committed to providing the service quality and value that our clients expect. The firm will use its strategy, staff and systems to provide each client with a seamless three-part customer experience: service product, service environment and service delivery- each part of which will meet or exceed our customer’s expectations.


Our vision is to become the first-choice engineering firm in Uganda and a respected company, as measured by our customers, employees, shareholders and the community in which we live.

Our values are critical to our success. They are a strong foundation that define who we are, and set us apart from our competitors.

These values include: Performance excellence, Punctuality, Team work, Integrity, Fear of God.
